availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry Tandy (Caldwell co farmer., Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Zerilda Gray Tandy in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on November 16, 1835. Father of Lucinda F. Tandy, George A. O. Tandy, Gustavus H. Tandy, and Marcellus Tandy. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Owned five enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860. Owned fourteen enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 370B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 791.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Long Pond, p. 2.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Long Pond, p. 215A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000851644, p. 232.
